alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Oakland; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 7:38PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN OAKLAND...LIVINGSTON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHTENAW COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 737 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Howell to near Ann Arbor. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ann Arbor, Novi, Hartland, Howell, Brighton, Milford, Pinckney, Hamburg, South Lyon, Northville, Salem, Dixboro, Whitmore Lake, Wixom, Barton Hills, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Delhi Mills, New Hudson, Lakeland, and Chilson. This includes the following highways... I-94 between mile markers 171 and 178. I-96 between mile markers 133 and 161. M-14 between mile markers 1 and 14. US-23 between mile markers 38 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
